items.title: Smart Billing Crossword
items.instructions: Complete the crossword puzzle with billing terms.

items.clue: System where the bank automatically pays your bills.
Public service like water, gas, or electricity.
A payment that was not made by the due date.
A payment that happens repeatedly at fixed intervals.
Regular payment for a service like Netflix or Spotify.
